system.name: Boo!
system.effect:
Trigger - Your Pokémon reappears after using Ghost Step, or the set-up phase of Phantom Force or Shadow Force
Effect: The next Ghost-Type attack the target makes that turn gains the Smite keyword and can’t be Intercepted or avoided in any way (Dodge, Parry, Shield Moves, etc).
system.prerequisites: Ghost Step, Type-Linked Skill at Master
